bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ①Identical with bing 病 , disease. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 3: 去一切諸勞疾疹 , “Removes all types of diseases associated with exhaustion ailment”.

② Pathological Condition of skin diseases characterised by skin elevations sometimes resembling strings of cash, sometimes hemp seeds or beans. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 30: 初發疹起，大者 如連錢，小者如麻豆 , “When it begins, papules rise, large ones resembling strings of cash, small ones resembling hemp or beans”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 refers to various disease names associated with the emergence of papules, such as feng zhen 風 疹， wind papules, ban zhen 癍疹 , maculopapular eruption, and dan zhen 丹疹 , bolus papules.
